verses.text: The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H5002"\w* unto my \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w Sit|strong="H3427"\w* thou at my right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, until I \w make|strong="H7896"\w* thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* thy \w footstool|strong="H1916"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w send|strong="H7971"\w* the \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* of thy \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* out of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: \w rule|strong="H7287"\w* thou in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

Thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add shall be\add* \w willing|strong="H5071"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w power|strong="H2428"\w*, in the \w beauties|strong="H1926"\w* of \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w* from the \w womb|strong="H7358"\w* of the \w morning|strong="H4891"\w*: thou hast the \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* of thy \w youth|strong="H3208"\w*.\f + \fr 110.3 \ft fromâ€¦: or, more than the womb of the morning: thou shalt have, etc\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w*, and will not \w repent|strong="H5162"\w*, Thou \add art\add* a \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* after the \w order|strong="H1700"\w* of \w Melchizedek|strong="H4442"\w*.

The \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* at thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* shall \w strike|strong="H4272"\w* through \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*.

He shall \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, he shall \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \add the places\add* with the dead \w bodies|strong="H1472"\w*; he shall \w wound|strong="H4272"\w* the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* over \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 110.6 \ft many: or, great\f*
He shall \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* of the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: therefore shall he lift \w up|strong="H7311"\w* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.
